org.dellroad.jibxbindings

Class ParseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.jibxbindings.ParseUtil

  • public final class ParseUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    JiBX parsing utility methods.

    • Method Detail

      • deserializeURI

        public static java.net.URI deserializeURI(java.lang.String string)
                                   throws JiBXParseException
        Deserialize an URI.
        Throws:
        JiBXParseException
        See Also:
        serializeURI(java.net.URI)

      • serializeURI

        public static java.lang.String serializeURI(java.net.URI uri)
        Serialize an URI.
        See Also:
        deserializeURI(java.lang.String)

      • normalize

        public static java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String string)
        JiBX String deserializer that normalizes a string as is required by the xsd:token XSD type. This removes leading and trailing whitespace, and collapses all interior whitespace down to a single space character.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if string is null

      • deserializeMatching

        public static java.lang.String deserializeMatching(java.lang.String regex,
                                   java.lang.String string)
                                            throws JiBXParseException
        JiBX String deserializer support method that verifies that the input string matches the given regular expression. This method can be invoked by custom deserializers that supply the regular expression to it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if string of regex is null
        JiBXParseException - if string does not match regex
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if regex is not a valid regular expression

      • deserializeBoolean

        public static boolean deserializeBoolean(java.lang.String string)
                                  throws JiBXParseException
        Boolean parser that allows "yes" and "no" as well as the usual "true", "false", "0", "1".
        Throws:
        JiBXParseException - if the value is not recognizable as a boolean

      • deserializeRFC5322Timestamp

        JiBXParseException
        See Also:

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T deserializeEnumOrNull(java.lang.String string,
                                                    java.lang.Class<T> type)
                                                      throws JiBXParseException
        Deserialize an Enum. Either the name() or string value may match, and treat an empty string like null.
        Throws:
        JiBXParseException
